== Dots ==

The non-confidential config store. Of course, confidential config values are not reused across devices.

== Dependencies ==

* Git, obviously
* Bash or zsh, while I haven't backed up zsh configs.
** If bash, [https://github.com/Bash-it/bash-it bash-it].
** If zsh, [http://ohmyz.sh/ oh my zsh].
* gnupg or gnupg2.
* [https://github.com/dschep/ntfy ntfy] and <code>ntfy[telegram]</code>
